This works fine, but you must do this:

1. install
2. Run the 5.7 update(It's in the PATCHES directory)
3. Use the crack in the CRACK directory to patch the executeable

If you try run crack without patching first it will give you an error.

This is version 1.57. Further updates can be found on emule.

Ok if it says to you error cannot access file, or whatever it says, appears to be an issue with Windows Vista, follow these steps as it worked for me.

1. Move the crack to the dark basic folder
2.RIGHT CLICK the crack and select RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR.

3. Then try patching it and it should patch ok.
